org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman

Class RungeKutta4

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman.RungeKutta4

  • public class RungeKutta4
extends Object
    Propagate a charged particle according to the magnetic field map by 4th order Runge Kutta integration. Note that the coordinate system is the Kalman-Filter-code system, as that is what the field-map routine called here assumes.
